name: A Game For Game Journalists
description:
Ever notice how many games are just to difficult for main stream game journalists?

Ever notice how alot of game journalist just don't have time to sit down and play a video game they are reviewing for more than 10 mins even though it's their job?

Well no more! Introducing "A Game For Game Journalists". 

Specifically designed with game journalist in mind. Through hours of tedious research, we've figured out what game journalist want; short and simple.  And with our new AUTO PLAY feature, it's bound to make any game journalist happy.

Features "real" reviews in the game by completely totally "real" people.

And for all you completionists, there are THREE, count 'em, THREE Endings for you to get. Not the mention, a nifty hat. 

A Game For Game Journalist. We're bound to get great reviews.
